page.title: 16RECREATION.CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {RIDING.}There are 2 stables,{MERLEY {RIDING STABLES}which covers l4acres, has 14 horses & is owned & run by Miss Whittle.CANFORD PARK EQUITATION CENTRE which covers 6acres,& has the largest covered exercise area in the South,is disused at the moment.There are many bridle paths also access to open heath Merley Hse.& grounds has been convert- ed into holiday flats & a holiday park of 20acres,containing caravans which are not sub-let.On another part of the grounds is{MERLEY TOURING PARK,}which caters for the holidaymaker who trav- els by caravans.It covers 10.5acres & has 160 pitches.Facilities are a heat- ed swimming pool,club,shop,cafeteria,2 toilet blocks & showers.5 people are employed on a part-time basis.It is a family concern owned & run by Mr & Mrs Wright & their 2 sons.
